insert into t_client (user_code, invitation_code, is_delete, create_time, create_user, gmt_modfied, last_modfied_by, version) values (#{userCode}, #{invitationCode}, 0, now(), #{userCode}, now(), #{userCode}, 0)

mapper.select: select user_code userCode, name, user_acct userAcct, user_password userPassword, idcard idCard, sex, phone, mail, role, version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userCode} and is_delete = 0

select a.name, a.user_acct userAcct, a.idcard, a.sex, a.phone, a.mail from t_sys_user a where a.is_delete = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.role = 2 order by create_time desc

select a.name, a.user_acct userAcct, a.idcard, a.sex, a.phone, a.mail from t_sys_user a, t_client b where a.is_delete = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and b.user_code = a.user_code and b.invitation_code = #{invitationCode} order by a.create_time desc
